page.title: 03Mr Robinson ( cont.)
page.content: but usually I get the food from the town.When I sell the animals I take them to the{Bingley}or{Skipton} auctions.I sell sixty animals in a year.I also have two hundred chickens and hens.I have a sheep dog to help me gather the animals in.I usually finish work at 6 o'clock in the evening.My wife does not help me on the farm but my two sons do help me.In the winter I go out and check the animals at night. I usually go to bed quite late.As I work from dawn until dusk ,seven days a week,I do not have any spare time.It is very important for a farmer to enjoy his work.
